name: Persona 5: Goro Akechi Dating Simulator
description: Goro Akechi is a  character from the hit popular jrpg game Persona 5 and Persona 5 Royal. In this game you could date him and do certain romantic scenarios. This game have 14 endings ,some short and some long and it's decided by the options you picked. So if you are a Goro Akechi fan and have him as your husbado, you need to play this game to fulfill your Goro Akechi needs.
